Name: Attitude Adjuster
Ingredients: 5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola then DRIZZLE orange and coffee liqueurs.
Review: Sip through orange and coffee liqueur to a gin-laced orange cola drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Attitude Adjuster contains 211 calories
